#labels Procedures
Increments the event reference count.

Interface to OpenCL [http://www.khronos.org/registry/cl/sdk/1.1/docs/man/xhtml/clRetainEvent  clRetainEvent].

== Interface ==

<code language="Fortran">
subroutine clRetainEvent(event, errcode_ret)
  type(cl_event),   intent(inout) :: event
  integer,          intent(out)   :: errcode_ret
end subroutine clRetainEvent
</code>
